name: AeroGarden
0:
”Alexa, open my garden”
”Alexa, ask my garden for a tip”
”Alexa, ask my garden do my plants need food”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my garden
Developer Terms of Use
des: By commanding: "Alexa Open My AeroGarden" you now can ask her to turn the grow light On and Off, and the status of water and food needs of your Wi-Fi enabled AeroGardens: Harvest Wi-Fi, all Wi-Fi enabled Bounties, and all Farm Models. Alexa can also recognize any name you have given your AeroGarden and if you have more than one, she will ask you "which garden?"
